snippet: Jordanian authorities appealed to the United States on Wednesday for surveillance airplanes and intelligence help to secure a border that is favored by arms smugglers.
abstract: Jordanian authorities appeal to the United States for surveillance airplanes and intelligence help to secure border with Syria that is favored by arms smugglers; also seeks increase in humanitarian assistance to help cope with Syrian refugee population that is straining water and food supplies, as well as schools and hospitals.
lead_paragraph: Jordanian authorities appealed to the United States on Wednesday for surveillance airplanes and intelligence help to secure a border that is favored by arms smugglers.
